channel.title: Comments on: Mission Of Burma, The Obliterati (Matador)

item.title: By: Mission of Burma reissue campaign, tour dates
item.dc:creator: Mission of Burma reissue campaign, tour dates
item.description: [...] with music that could easily sit next to its classics without tarnishing any of them. And The Obliterati proved none of it was a fluke, turning out to be Mission of Burma’s most blistering [...]
